summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Friday 29 October to end of Friday 29 October GMT
description: Low pressure fronts arriving from the Atlantic will affect the weather in Greater London. Staying mild, cloudy and generally breezy. Spells of rain likely, and could turn heavy at times. <br/>There'll be a fresh breeze to disperse local emissions and little imported pollution. <br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
